about_the_game:
Customize your pilot with this Vector 36 DLC racewear set.

Adapted from the Sub-orbital transport dockers, The Stratus One is designed for high heat and speed scenarios.

Helmet - Stratus One
Race Suit - Plateau
detailed_description:
Customize your pilot with this Vector 36 DLC racewear set.

Adapted from the Sub-orbital transport dockers, The Stratus One is designed for high heat and speed scenarios.

Helmet - Stratus One
Race Suit - Plateau

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: i5 or equivelent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: i5 or equivelent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB card
